name: Skeleton Arena
description:
Concept 

You're caught by the skeleton army and there's only one way to get out: beat the Skeleton Queen and the Skeleton King in their beloved colosseum.

Skeleton arena is a simplistic 2D action game where you're put to fights to the death against the bosses of the underground. Learn their way of fighting and beat them to earn your way out back to the surface!

Controls

Arrow Keys: Move and Jump

Space: Attack

Diversifiers

Winning Run, Voy@ger, and Sus
